mapper.insert: INSERT INTO faq_chat_message (user_id, role, content, faq_id, score) VALUES (#{userId}, #{role}, #{content}, #{faqId}, #{score})
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id AS userId, role, content, faq_id AS faqId, score, created_at AS createdAt FROM faq_chat_message WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT #{limit}
